title: Lord of Lockdowns
sub_head: Why did we ever import Xi Jinping’s Covid policy?
body:
If you thought academics and government health bureaucrats in the U.S. took a long time to recognize the destructive nature of Covid lockdowns, consider Xi Jinping’s communist dictatorship in China. The regime remains ideologically committed to extreme restraints on human liberty.
